message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product for $13,000. It's in excellent condition and I believe it's a great deal for you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm not willing to go above $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I can't go as low as $10,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's settle at $11,000. This gives you a good deal and still allows me to make a reasonable profit. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,500? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can come to an agreement.
